activity.title: beckn/future-of-work#1
activity.text:
Hi @ravi-prakash-v 
I'm Anand Kasaudhan, passionate about decentralized systems and AI. I'd love to contribute to the Beckn-enabled workplace management project. 
I would appreciate it if you could provide me with some key starting points and the essential skills needed to better understand how AI can be implemented in this project. This will help me gain a deeper insight into the practical application of AI in this context.
